title: The Treasure of Gwenlais
description: Librarian's note: There is an Alternate Cover Edition for this edition of this book here.Princess Laurel from the faraway and sheltered kingdom of Gwenlais. Prince Caleb, a battle hardened warrior of the harsh and untamed realm of Heathwin. Brought together by tragedy. Their hearts joined by the forging of an alliance. Will an unknown enemy destroy their kingdoms and their love? Come and experience the beauty, danger, and romance of an epic historical medieval fantasy that whispers of Celtic legend.A world unlike any imagined a love story that will leave you breathless.This is the epic world of Rienfield. A domain filled with beauty, danger, amazing races and cultures. You will find the love and strong ties of family. As well as romance, humor, adventure and tragedy, while the people and beings of Rienfield, search for peace and truth in their way of life.
author: M.T. Magee
